definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: spring (si vera 1.) (√ unknown);—only pl. cstr. [[נִבְכֵי־יׇם]] Job 38:16 the springs, sources of the ocean (‖[[חֵ֫קֶר תְּהוֹם]]);—Ol Siegf [[נִבְלֵי]]; Bu suggests [[נבעי]] = [[מֵבֻּעֵי]] as poss.; but Gr Perles rd. [[נִבְכֵי]] Job 28:11, also, for Mass. [[מִבְּכִי]], cf. [[נׇהָר]]
